glsa.title: IPsec-Tools: racoon Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: IPsec-Tools' racoon is affected by a remote Denial of Service vulnerability.

background.p: IPsec-Tools is a port of KAME's implementation of the IPsec utilities. It contains a collection of network monitoring tools, including racoon, ping, and ping6.

description.p: Sebastian Krahmer has reported a potential remote Denial of Service vulnerability in the ISAKMP header parsing code of racoon.

impact.p: An attacker could possibly cause a Denial of Service of racoon using a specially crafted ISAKMP packet.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
